R Markdown and Leaflet

```{r, eval=TRUE}
library(leaflet)
options(viewer = NULL)
my_map <- leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% addMarkers(lat=40.626446, lng= 22.948404, popup="White Tower in Thessaloniki")
my_map
```
#####The  map shows the location of the White Tower in Thessaloniki, Greece.
